package.name: logic-symbols
package.author: Max Gallup
package.description: Commonly used symbols in predicate logic and boolean algebra.
package.title: Logic Symbols

manifest.author: Max Gallup
manifest.description: Commonly used symbols in predicate logic and boolean algebra.
manifest.name: logic-symbols
manifest.title: Logic Symbols

value.readme:
A simple package including common unicode logic [symbols](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_logic_symbols).

### Installation
```
espanso install logic-symbols
```

### Usage

The following basic symbols are included, but feel free to add more!

Keyword | Emoji
--- | ---
`:not` | ¬
`:and` | ∧
`:or` | ∨
`:xor` | ⊕
`:imp` | →
`:biimp` | ⟷
`:eq` | ≡
`:true` | ⊤
`:false` | ⊥
`:all` | ∀
`:exists` | ∃

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - trigger: ":not"
    replace: "¬"
  - trigger: ":and"
    replace: "∧"
  - trigger: ":or"
    replace: "∨"
  - trigger: ":xor"
    replace: "⊕"
  - triggers: [":imp", ":if"]
    replace: "→"
  - triggers: [":bimp", ":iff"]
    replace: "↔"
  - triggers: [":eq", ":def"]
    replace: "≡"
  - triggers: [":true", ":top"]
    replace: "⊤"
  - triggers: [":false", ":bot"]
    replace: "⊥"
  - trigger: ":forall"
    replace: "∀"
  - trigger: ":exists"
    replace: "∃"
  - trigger: ":proves"
    replace: "⊢"
  - trigger: ":models"
    replace: "⊨"
